verses.t: Have mercy{H2603} upon me, O God{H430}, according to thy lovingkindness{H2617}: according unto the multitude{H7230} of thy tender mercies{H7356} blot out{H4229} my transgressions{H6588}.
Wash{H3526} me throughly{H7235} from mine iniquity{H5771}, and cleanse{H2891} me from my sin{H2403}.
For I acknowledge{H3045} my transgressions{H6588}: and my sin{H2403} is ever{H8548} before me.
